title: Salmon With Sriracha Sauce and Lime
directions: Heat oven to 425Â°. In a bowl, whisk together juice, zest, syrup, sriracha and salt.
Place salmon in a baking dish lined with parchment paper; pour lime-maple mixture over top.
Roast salmon until cooked through and flaky, 15 minutes. Sprinkle with cilantro; serve.
